amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for implementation of any regulation requiring businesses and restaurants to admit service horses into their areas of operation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement a section of the Americans with Disabilities Act which allows miniature horses to be used as service animals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
